name: Choice Band
description: Boosts Attack by 50% but locks the holder into one move.

name: Choice Specs
description: Boosts Sp. Atk by 50% but locks the holder into one move.

name: Choice Scarf
description: Boosts Speed by 50% but locks the holder into one move.

name: Life Orb
description: Boosts move power by 30% but costs 10% HP per attack.

name: Expert Belt
description: Boosts super-effective moves by 20%.

name: Leftovers
description: Restores 1/16 of max HP at the end of each turn.

name: Focus Sash
description: Survives a one-hit KO with 1 HP when at full health. Single use.

name: Assault Vest
description: Boosts Sp. Def by 50% but prevents the use of status moves.

name: Eviolite
description: Boosts Def and Sp. Def by 50% if the holder can still evolve.

name: Mystic Water
description: Boosts Water-type moves by 20%.

name: Charcoal
description: Boosts Fire-type moves by 20%.

name: Magnet
description: Boosts Electric-type moves by 20%.

name: Sitrus Berry
description: Restores 25% of max HP when HP drops below 50%.

name: Lum Berry
description: Cures any status condition when afflicted. Single use.

name: Rawst Berry
description: Cures a burn when afflicted. Single use.

name: Chesto Berry
description: Cures sleep when afflicted. Single use.

name: Damp Rock
description: Extends the duration of Rain Dance.

name: Heat Rock
description: Extends the duration of Sunny Day.

name: Smooth Rock
description: Extends the duration of Sandstorm.

name: Icy Rock
description: Extends the duration of Hail.

name: Light Clay
description: Extends the duration of Light Screen and Reflect.

name: Lucky Egg
description: Increases experience gained by 50%.
